item.title: Octane AI
item.description: Octane AI helps e-commerce brands create personalized shopping experiences through AI-powered quizzes and chatbots. Used by brands like Kosas, Native, and Judy, Octane AI has helped businesses increase conversion rates by up to 40% by making product discovery personal and interactive. item.title: Taskade
item.description: Taskade is the AI-powered workspace where teams collaborate, brainstorm, and get things done. Used by over 1 million teams worldwide, Taskade combines the best of project management, note-taking, and brainstorming in one intuitive platform. The AI features help generate ideas, create tasks, and optimize workflows without getting in your way.
